subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to be [[satisfied]]; to be [[sated]]
# to be [[fed up]] with; to grow [[bored]] of; to become [[tired]] of
# to [[detest]]; to [[dislike]]; to [[hate]]
